name: Escape the Dungeon (Mr. Pergerson, PV Scylla)
name_original: Escape the Dungeon (Mr. Pergerson, PV Scylla)
description:
PREMISE

Inspired by Greek mythology, follow Illas as he tries to escape the abandoned temple. Collect all four keys to escape!

CONTROLS

WASD to move
Left click to fire
F to unlock doors (if you see prompt)
